 Launch Shiny App

#### Description 
 
Launches shiny app

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
ds_launch_shiny_app()
</code></pre>

#### Deprecated Function
launch_descriptr() has been deprecated. Instead use ds_launch_shiny_app().


#### Examples 
```{r}

## Not run:
ds_launch_shiny_app()
## End(Not run)
```
